field.name: description
field.value:
The following error occurs during NAnt build of /svn/castle/branches/net-2.0-trunk revision 5600. Build currently fails with the following error:
common.compile-dll:
[csc] Compiling 178 files to 'C:\SourceControl\CastleStronghold\CastleProject-net-2.0-trunk\build\net-2.0\debug\Castle.MicroKernel.dll'. [csc] c:\SourceControl\CastleStronghold\CastleProject-net-2.0-trunk\InversionOfControl\Castle.MicroKernel\Handlers\DefaultHandler.cs(72,5): error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'var' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?)
BUILD FAILED

comment.author: klawry
comment.text: Attached patch to correct implicit type for compatibility in .NET 2.0 branch.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: Applied with other changes in r5619.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Applied''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Work Started'' to ''Resolved''.

comment.author: klawry
comment.text:
